stimulusHtml: Which of the following code segments, appearing in a class other than Painting, will correctly create an instance of a Painting object?

features.html:
Consider the following Painting class.

 

public class Painting
{
   private int year;
   private String artist;
   private String title;

   public Painting(int y, String a)
   {
      year = y;
      artist = a;
      title = "Untitled";    
   }
   
   // There are no other constructors.
}

choicesHtml: Painting p = new Painting("Frida Kahlo", "Self Portrait", 1939);
Painting p = new Painting(1939, "Frida Kahlo", "Self Portrait");
